template_pool_element.title: Template Pool Element
template_pool_element.description: A template pool item used to define the element and its weight.

element.title: Element
element.description: A grouping of a Structure Template, the Processor List to use when placing the structure, and its weight that determines the likelihood of the element being chosen.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The weighted probability of choosing the element from the pool. For example, a template pool containing 2 structures with weights of 1 and 3 will have a 25% and 75% chance of being chosen respectively.

location.title: Location
location.description: The path of the structure file. This path is relative to the behavior pack's "structures" folder.

processors.title: Processors
processors.description: The identifier of the processor list to use when placing the structure.

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: Specifies how structures should be placed relative to the terrain.

anyOf.description: Structures are placed without any height adjustment.
Structures are placed relative to the terrain height. Structure blocks will adjust along the Y axis to match the ground.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of this template pool.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the template pool. This is used by both the start_pool property of the Jigsaw Structure JSON and the Jigsaw Block's Target Pool field.

fallback.title: Fallback
fallback.description: Fallback template pool to use if no element in the pool can be placed successfully.
